hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Third Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Barinade#.

Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right
